name: Blood 4 Fuel
description:
After being permanently attached to a flamethrower you find yourself in a underground laboratory that has been overrun with strange creatures. Half-organic, Half machine and fully hostile they intend on shredding you to pieces.

Try to destroy their source while your health and ammunition has been joined together both physically and gameplay-wise since the flamethrower, your only weapon, is fueling itself using your blood.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move Player
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Fire Flamethrower
Q, E - Adjust Maximum Health and Ammunition
